pages.text: To start assembling components, you need an assembler. It allows you to craft items like wires, coils, and motors more efficiently, and can craft items you cannot make by hand.

pages.title: Centrifuge Crafting
pages.text: Next, you'll want to build a centrifuge. This machine is essential for processing resources into components needed for further progress. Build a $(l:oritech:processing/centrifuge)centrifuge$().
